subject: Baseball
College Athletics
organizations: State University of New York at Stony Brook
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Baltz hit two two-run homers, and St. John’s beat Virginia, 6-5, in the Charlottesville Regional to force a decisive game.
snippet: Jeremy Baltz hit two two-run homers, and St. John’s beat Virginia, 6-5, in the Charlottesville Regional to force a decisive game.
